title: So I went to the LCS today
body:
I wasn't really excited about going at first but I have to admit Riot did I good job of making the place fun.  There some really annoying kids in front of my friends and me saying things like, "Why didn't Azir rush Nashor's???", "Luden's would be good on AD Varus Mid", "Why are they warding Baron so early it spawns at 30 minutes?", etc. and were generally really annoying but they left early so it was k.  Not to mention there was this fine af girl sitting in a few rows ahead of us.  

We started out in line and they gave out free lanyards and I thought to myself, "Wow Riot isn't as cheap as I thought they were!"  but then I went to the merch store and saw the sweaters priced at 80 bucks.  kek.  I also got to high five Dig after their win and hug Kiwi and take a pic with them.  Was much better than I thought it would be.  Piglet getting dunkt by Jarvan was the best part of the day.  Here's a picture of me and them.  I'm the fucking pancake in the middle.

http://i.imgur.com/JUQFLEw.jpg

kek as you please at my nerdy loserness
